title: I lived in a converted toolshed after the 2008 recession. It taught me resilience, and now, I run multiple businesses.
description: I lost my job and apartment in 2007, so I moved into a toolshed. It was very bare bones, but I learned all the skills I needed to be an entrepreneur.

title: ‘Dr. Doom’ Nouriel Roubini breaks with the crowd on the AI bubble, saying the U.S. is headed for a ‘growth recession’ and not a market crash
description: “The now common view,” according to the NYU Stern School of Business professor emeritus, “is incorrect over the medium term.”

title: When will mortgage rates go down to 5%? Here’s what experts say.
description: One housing expert says it's simply a matter of time — or a recession. Here are four steps you can take now to prepare for mortgage rates falling to 5%.

title: The 7 parts of the US economy that are already in a recession
description: From homebuilding to trucking, major parts of the US economy are in deep trouble. The weakness could drag the whole country into a recession.
